text: Niccayamāka sapā nāṭṭiṉarukku, avarkaḷ vacittirunta iṭaṅkaḷil ōr attāṭci iruntatu. (Ataṉ) valappuṟattilum iṭappuṟattilum iraṇṭu cōlaikaḷ iruntaṉa"uṅkaḷ iṟaivaṉ aḷittuḷḷa ākārattiliruntu puciyuṅkaḷ; avaṉukku naṉṟiyum celutti vāruṅkaḷ. (Atu maṇamuḷḷa) vaḷamāṉa nakaram; iṉṉum (avaṉ) maṉṉippaḷikkum iṟaivaṉ" (eṉṟu avarkaḷukkuk kūṟappaṭṭatu)
